resources.string: When do you want to turn the wifi back off?
When do you want to turn the wifi back on?

Using Wifi Timer is easy! Just turn-off the wifi using the power control widget or the settings menu.


Whenever you set your wifi to off you will be prompted to enter the time at which you would like your wifi to be turned back on.


The timer will always be initialized to the current time, so if you want to set the timer for two hours, just tap the hour + button twice.


Once the timer has been set, a notification will appear in the notification bar indicating the time remaining. You can select the notification to adjust or cancel the timer. You can also cancel the timer at any time by simply turning the wifi back on using the power control widget or the menu settings.


You can also choose Wifi Timer to switch your wifi off after a laps of time instead. Visit the settings to choose this option.


If you decide you don't want to be prompted anymore, just uninstall the application.

"Since 2.3.3 on my Nexus One, I started to have less battery time. I did this little app to save my battery while I'm at work and don't have a wifi access point. I hope this application can be useful for you too! When this application is installed, each time you turn your wifi off you will be asked how long you would like before restoring it. After that period of time has passed, your wifi will be automatically turned back on."
Choose on which event Wifi Timer shows up.
